description.ruby-sapphire:
Attacks with muddy water.
May lower accuracy.
description.emerald:
Attacks with muddy water.
May lower accuracy.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user attacks
with muddy water.
It may also lower
the foe’s accuracy.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks by
shooting out muddy
water.
It may also lower the
foe’s accuracy.

The user attacks by

water.

The user attacks by
shooting out muddy
water.
It may also lower the

description.black-white:
The user attacks by shooting muddy water
at the opposing team.
It may also lower the targets’ accuracy.

at the opposing Pokémon.

Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
